TitleEnglish: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister
SummaryEnglish: Uryu Kamihate is a high school student hoping to enroll in Kyoto University’s medical school. After being taken in by the chief priest at Amagami Shrine, he is told he must marry one of three maiden sisters—Yae, Yuna, or Asahi—to live at, and one day inherit, the Amagami Shrine. Kamihate will need to sweep one of the maidens off her feet in this story of romance, friendship, and fun.
Aliases: How I Married an Amagami Sister

1.SummaryEnglish: A young man begins a new life at Amagami shrine, and meets the three sisters who live there.

2.SummaryEnglish: The sisters plot to drive Uryu away by making him do all the chores.

3.SummaryEnglish: Uryu has marriage meetings with all three of the sisters.

4.SummaryEnglish: The sisters are forced to get 5,000 people to come to their upcoming festival, or they'll have to sell the shrine.

5.SummaryEnglish: Trouble strikes on the day of the festival! Will enough people come to save the shrine?

6.SummaryEnglish: Uryu reflects on what happened after the shrine festival, and Asahi offers to help find the answer to his question.

7.TitleEnglish: Dream and Moon and Dream ~New Moon~
7.SummaryEnglish: The sisters seek help from the priestess who trained them, but are met with an unexpected demand.

8.TitleEnglish: Dream and Moon and Dream ~Half Moon~
8.SummaryEnglish: Yae wonders about her future, while Asahi thinks of moving away.

9.TitleEnglish: Dream and Moon and Dream ~Full Moon~
9.SummaryEnglish: The girls give Yomiko the answer, and Uryu promises to support their dreams.

10.SummaryEnglish: With spring break over, Uryu unexpectedly finds himself at the same school as Yuna.

11.TitleEnglish: The Real Reason for Staying Up Late ~Prelude~
11.SummaryEnglish: As the sisters and Uryu go out for a late-night trip, Uryu wonders about something strange he found...

12.TitleEnglish: The Real Reason for Staying Up Late ~Connections~
12.SummaryEnglish: The sisters, Makoto, and Uryu arrive at Inari Shrine, where Uryu has a strange experience.

13.TitleEnglish: The Real Reason for Staying Up Late ~Love~
13.SummaryEnglish: Uryu remembers how he first met Yae, and Yae makes a big decision.

14.SummaryEnglish: Asahi is training for a marathon, but an unexpected rainstorm moves it to the day of a big festival at the shrine.

15.TitleEnglish: The Scales That Hold Wishes ~Going Back~
15.SummaryEnglish: After failing to escape from the time loop, Uryu is forced to consider what it is that Asahi really wants.

16.TitleEnglish: The Scales That Hold Wishes ~Going Forward~
16.SummaryEnglish: Asahi realizes what it is she really wants as the loop comes to an end.

17.TitleEnglish: The Send-Off Fires and the Vow With the Gods
17.SummaryEnglish: When Uryu's grades start to slip, the sisters make a decision.

18.SummaryEnglish: Yuna and Uryu are forced to deal with a shocking occurrence.

19.SummaryEnglish: While Yuna and Uryu get used to their new life, Yuna's best friend notices something is wrong.

20.SummaryEnglish: As the culture festival comes to a close, Yuna reflects on what really drives her.

21.SummaryEnglish: Shirahi is heartbroken when she sees the growing relationship between Uryu and the sisters.

22.SummaryEnglish: Uryu is stunned as the three sisters look at him in fear, calling him a "stranger" and a "suspicious person." Hakuhi gently comforts him and says with a smile, "Uryu and I are lovers." It seems that Uryu has been transported to another world. In this world where he and Hakuhi are lovers, Uryu has not left Kisekien and seems to be living a peaceful and happy high school life with Hakuhi. A safe home, a stable future, and a cute lover... What is Uryu thinking in this world where he lacks for everything...?

23.SummaryEnglish: Uryu discovers the truth about what led him to this world.

24.TitleEnglish: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister
24.SummaryEnglish: Uryu and Shirahi make a choice about their future.
